title: Ep. 547 Are We Being Sold Out Again?
description:
In this episode-  If national bankruptcy is staring us in the face, why are we doing so little to stop it? http://www.frontpagemag.com/fpm/267839/vox-trump-vox-populi-bruce-thornton   Why can't Hollywood-types just act and sing? I'm getting tired of their silly lectures. https://www.conservativereview.com/articles/wtf-msm-a-politicized-hurricane-relief#undefined.uxfs   The ratings for the NFL keep going down, here's why.  https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2017-09-13/nfl-tv-ratings-slump-again-as-hurricane-coverage-steals-viewers   The federal government raised record tax revenue through August and it still ran a huge deficit. https://www.cnsnews.com/news/article/terence-p-jeffrey/feds-collect-record-taxes-through-august-still-run-6737b-deficit   Shape-shifting bacteria in space? No way! http://news.sky.com/story/shape-shifting-bacteria-spotted-on-international-space-station-11033655        
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
